name: theros
description: Comprehensive Theros-themed package: devotion, heroic, bestow, monstrosity, scry, enchantment-creatures, gods, ordeals, weapons, and Greek-myth flavor.

Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: {THIS} gains indestructible until end of turn.
Enchantment: As long as your devotion to white is 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.
As long as your devotion to blue is 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.
As long as your devotion to black is 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.
As long as your devotion to red is 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.
As long as your devotion to green is 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.

Instant: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry {SCRY_N}.
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry {SCRY_N}.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Scry {SCRY_N}.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast an enchantment spell this turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Enchantment Creature — God. Indestructible. As long as your devotion to white is less than five, {THIS} isn't a creature. Other creatures you control have vigilance.
Enchantment Creature — {RANDOM_SUBTYPE}. Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, {TARGET_UNIT} gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

Bestow {BESTOW_COST_MOD} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) {BESTOW_AFFIX}

Monstrosity {MONSTROSITY_N} — {ACTIVATED_COST}: If {THIS} isn't monstrous, put {MONSTROSITY_N} +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous. When {THIS} becomes monstrous, tap up to {NUM_SMALL} target creatures. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
As long as your devotion to {DEVOTION_COLOR_WORD} is {NUM_MED} or greater, {THIS} has {AURA_ABILITY_W}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets {AURA_STAT_BOOST} and has {AURA_ABILITY_W}.
Enchant creature. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice {THIS}. When you sacrifice {THIS}, {ORDEAL_BONUS_W}.
Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets {AURA_STAT_BOOST} and has {AURA_ABILITY_W}. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
